00009 function __autoload($ClassName)
00010 {
00011         $FileName = './';
00012         $Pieces = explode("\\", $ClassName);
00013         foreach($Pieces AS $Piece)
00014                 $FileName .= $Piece.'/';
00015         $FileName[strlen($FileName)-1] = '.';
00016         $FileName .= 'class.php';
00017         require($FileName);
00018 }
